name: Community Development Financial Institutions Program Loan
objective: To promote economic revitalization and community development through investment in and assistance to certified Community Development Financial Institutions (CDFIs).
assistance_types: State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: Visit the CDFI Fund website for information on program accomplishments. The information can be accessed via www.cdfifund.gov/programs-training/Programs/cdfi-program.

authorizations.text: Riegle Community Development and Regulatory Improvement Act of 1994.

rules_regulations: 12 C.F.R. Part 1805; NOFA; and application materials.
